etomica.modules.chainequilibrium

Class ChainEquilibriumGraphic

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.graphics.SimulationGraphic
      • etomica.modules.chainequilibrium.ChainEquilibriumGraphic
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SimulationContainer

    public class ChainEquilibriumGraphic
extends SimulationGraphic
    Module for chain reaction (polymerization) using ChainEquilibriumSim as the simulation class. Original module by William Scharmach and Matt Moynihan. Later revamped based on module redesign by William M. Chirdon.
